metadata.description: Opinionated skills for Claude Code reflecting SICP principles, functional and logic programming paradigms, and expert-level software engineering judgment.

plugins.name: opinionated-software-engineering
plugins.description: Core opinionated software engineering skills: SICP-based software engineering, paradigm skills (functional, OOP, logic), development process (TDD, git), and research agent.

plugins.name: opinionated-apple-development
plugins.description: Apple platform development: Swift language (Swift 6+ concurrency, protocol-oriented programming) and macOS platform patterns (SwiftUI/AppKit, sandboxing).

plugins.name: opinionated-lisp-development
plugins.description: Lisp family languages: Clojure (data-oriented design, REPL-driven development) and Racket (language-oriented programming, contracts, macros).

plugins.name: opinionated-java-ecosystem
plugins.description: Java ecosystem development: modern Java idioms, tooling, documentation standards, and testing practices.

plugins.name: opinionated-logic-development
plugins.description: Logic programming with SWI-Prolog: relational thinking, steadfastness, DCGs, constraints, and PlUnit testing.

plugins.name: opinionated-python-development
plugins.description: Python development: Pythonic idioms, testing ecosystem, type hints trade-offs, and modern Python features.

plugins.name: opinionated-fish-shell
plugins.description: Fish shell scripting: Fish vs bash decisions, cross-platform compatibility, and Fish-specific patterns.

plugins.name: opinionated-skill-creation
plugins.description: Expert-level guidance for creating high-quality Claude Code skills. Use alongside Anthropic's skill-creator.
